alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:53PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Webster, Bossier and Bienville Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue rising to 17.0 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.9 feet on 05/07/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 1000 PM CDT.
